description.narrative:
Rädda Barnen (Save the Children Sweden) has applied to Sida for funding of 2 527 500 SEK to carry out the EU-project "Integrated child protection and education assistance responding to the most urgent needs of conflict-affected populations in North East and North West Syria" during 2021-2022.
The overall objective is:
“Providing needs-based education and child protection assistance to the most vulnerable children and their caregivers in North East and North West Syria”.
The specific objective is:
“Conflict affected boys and girls, and their families benefit from a strengthened child protection and education environment in North East and North West Syria”.
The target population include adolescent girls and boys, children with disabilities (CwD), unaccompanied and separated children (UASC), children associated with armed forces and groups (CAAFAG), and others.
The contribution has the EU Commission reference number ECHO/SYR/BUD/2021/91007. The contribution's total budget is 3 750 000 EUR, which corresponds to approximately 38 473 380 SEK. Of this, Save the Children has been granted 3 500 000 EUR från the European Commission and the requested support from Sida is 2 527 500 SEK, which corresponds to 7 % of the total budget.

Rädda Barnen har ansökt om finansiering av egeninsats om 2 527 500 SEK för EU-projektet "Integrated child protection and education assistance responding to the most urgent needs of conflict-affected populations in North East and North West Syria" för perioden 2021-2022.
Insatsens övergripande mål är:
“Providing needs-based education and child protection assistance to the most vulnerable children and their caregivers in North East and North West Syria”.
Insatsens specifika mål är:
“Conflict affected boys and girls, and their families benefit from a strengthened child protection and education environment in North East and North West Syria”.
Den primära målgruppen är flickor och pojkar, barn med funktionsvariationer, ensamkommande flyktingbarn samt barn med kopplingar till väpnade styrkor och grupper.
Den aktuella insatsen har EU-kommissionens referensnummer ECHO/SYR/BUD/2021/91007. Insatsen har en total budget på 3 750 000 EUR, vilket motsvarar cirka 38 473 380 SEK. Av detta har Rädda Barnen beviljats 3 500 000 EUR från EU-kommissionen och ansöker om 2 527 500 SEK, cirka 7 %, från Sida.

tag.narrative: 4.5 - By 2030, eliminate gender disparities in education and ensure equal access to all levels of education and vocational training for the vulnerable, including persons with disabilities, indigenous peoples and children in vulnerable situations.

4.5 - Senast 2030 avskaffa skillnaderna mellan könen inom utbildningsområdet och säkerställa lika tillgång till utbildning och yrkesutbildning på alla nivåer för utsatta personer, inklusive personer med funktionsnedsättning, ursprungsfolk och barn som lever under utsatta förhållanden.
